song.title: Bee Girl
song.lyrics:
Bee girl, you're gonna die You don't wanna be famous, you wanna be shy Do your dances alone in your room Becoming a star will become your doom Bee Girl, be a girl... (2x)
You know time is long, and life is short, begin to live while you still can Believe in nothing, believe me, those who can be trusted can change their mind The anxious is the present, unwrap your gifts, take your time Everything you imagined, needn't be stuck in your mind Bee Girl, be a girl (2x)
